title: Fix server util unit test for local execution

body:
## Describe your changes

The `test_get_url` unit test can be a bit annoying when executing the test suite locally. It fails if the port `8501` is used (e.g. by a dev Streamlit instance). This changes the test to not use the automatic port choosing behavior and instead enforces 8501 as the default port. 

## Testing Plan

- Just a change in a unit test

---
